common.transparency_desc: Transparency is our priority. Here you‚Äôll find all legal information about who we are and the rules of this website.

avis_legal.title: Legal Notice
avis_legal.section1_desc: In compliance with Law 34/2002 (LSSI-CE), we inform that the owner of this website is:
avis_legal.section2_p1: Access to this website is free. Simply accessing it does not imply any commercial relationship between DigitAI Studios and the user.
avis_legal.section2_p2: The user agrees to use the website in accordance with the law and this Legal Notice, refraining from using it for illicit purposes or those that may harm third-party interests.
avis_legal.section3_quote: All content (brands, logos, texts, photos, icons, images, etc.), as well as design, source code, and software, are the exclusive property of DigitAI Studios or third parties who have authorized their use, protected by national and international law.
avis_legal.section4_p1: DigitAI Studios is not responsible for:
avis_legal.section4_list_1: Possible security failures or damage to the user‚Äôs device (viruses, malware, etc.).
avis_legal.section4_list_2: Information posted on forums, social networks, or any platform that allows third-party content.
avis_legal.section4_list_3: The exact precision of automatic audits, which are indicative and based on the Google Lighthouse API.
avis_legal.section5_p1: Spanish legislation applies to all disputes related to this website. Parties expressly submit to the courts of Girona.

privacitat.title: Privacy Policy
privacitat.subtitle: Your privacy is sacred. Here we clearly explain what data we collect, why, and how we protect it.
privacitat.section1_title: 1. Who is responsible for your data?
privacitat.section1_text: The data controller is DigitAI Studios (see Legal Notice for full details). You can contact our Data Protection Officer at: dpd@digitaistudios.com.
privacitat.section2_desc: We only collect strictly necessary data to provide our services:
privacitat.data_audit_desc: The URL of the website you want to analyze and your email to send you the report.
privacitat.data_account_desc: Your name, email, and encrypted password when you register in the Dashboard.
privacitat.section3_title: 3. Who do we share data with?
privacitat.section3_desc: We do not sell your data. We only share it with essential tech providers:
privacitat.provider_supabase: Supabase: Database and authentication (Hosted in EU/AWS).
privacitat.provider_google: Google Cloud: API to process web audits.
privacitat.section4_p1: You have full control of your data. You can:
privacitat.rights_list_1: Access, rectify, or delete your data.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.subtitle: We use cookies to ensure the website works properly and to understand how we can improve it. Here are all details.
cookies.section1_quote: A cookie is a small text file stored in your browser when visiting practically any website. Its purpose is to remember your visit, maintain your session, or load the site properly.
cookies.section2_p1: This website uses the following types of cookies:
cookies.tech_desc: Essential for the website to function. Without them you couldn‚Äôt log in or navigate correctly.
cookies.analytics_desc: They allow us to measure usage and improve the service.
cookies.analytics_1: Native Analytics: Anonymous, privacy-friendly statistics (no invasive Google tracking).
cookies.section3_p1: You can allow, block, or delete cookies through your browser settings:
